title: Bobby Witnesses An Arrest + Amy Is Letting Her Daughter Take A Trip Away From Home For The First Time
itunes:title: Bobby Witnesses An Arrest + Amy Is Letting Her Daughter Take A Trip Away From Home For The First Time
description:
Bobby talks about having a front row seat to witness an arrest on his flight. Even though she’s super nervous, Amy is letting her daughter take a trip away from home without the family. Also, in today’s Mailbag segment, Bobby gives advice to a listener about dating her co-worker.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
